casebody.data:
2002-1798 (La. 10/14/02)

Geraldine BILLUPS v. Oliver C. LYONS, Kathleen W. Lyons, Raymond A. Vrazel, Jr., Barbara Snead Tedrow, Ad Couhig Southern Environmental Services of New Orleans. The Leader Mortgage Company v. Geraldine B. Billups. No. 2002-C-1798. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Couhig Southern Environmental Services of New Orleans Inc.; — Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. D, Nos. 99-13437, 00-7839; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No(s). 2001-CA-1654, 2001-CA-1655.

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J., would grant the writ. VICTORY, J., would grant the writ. WEIMER, J., would grant the writ.
